        Solves a linear equation with 3 unknowns using 3 equations. Use form ax + by + cz + CONSTANT = 0 Math from http://www.cplusplus.happycodings.com/Mathematics/code5.html

        z1 - z1 coefficient
        c1 - c1
        x2 - x2 coefficient

        Returns true if x is within a and b

      • limitFloat

        public float limitFloat(float number,
               float low,
               float high)
        limits a number by giving it a lower and uper limit
        Parameters:
        number - The number to limit
        low - the lowest value it should be
        high - the highest possible value
        Returns:
        The final number after the limit filter
